sentence: Attorney Harriet Hageman, the GOP primary contender Trump endorsed for Wyoming's lone, at-large congressional seat, enjoys strong establishment support, including from House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy of California.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Trump's GOP stranglehold faces major test in four primary battles
